attributes.review:
this is the absolute WORST app i have EVER downloaded. it took MONTHS to download and I ALMOST thought it was going to take a YEAR to download. Once it FINALLY downloaded I opened the app up and it was SOOOO LAGGY. I got it to stop lagging and thought i was going to see Trumps face, but instead I saw A MOLDY CHEETO!!!! I thought to myself, is this some kind of PRANK?!?!?! I then closed out of the app and deleted it. This app DESERVES a ONE STAR rating because of what a PRANK app this is. I still CAN'T BELIEVE my EYES!!! 👁💧👄💧👁
- me
attributes.title: for moldy cheeto🤮

attributes.review: first off, it took HOURS to download. then, while trying to open the app it kept crashing! every time it crashed, my phone froze and i had to reset it. ridiculous! finally after resetting it dozens of times, i could finally open the app without a crash. but, i was greeted with a blank white page!! this is the worst app ever. waste of phone space!

attributes.review: Hi!!
